ProductInfo.Features:
Google Android(Ice cream Sandwich) With Google Play Store pre-installed will give you access to 1+ million apps, games, music and videos. Micro SD   slot allows you to add up to 32GB extra storage space(8GB onboard).
Standard 800x480 resolution Multi-Touch Screen makes reading and running apps clearer. Stream your favorite Netflix via Wi-Fi.
Front-facing camera for video chatting, and rear-facing camera to capture that special moment. (1.3 MegaPixel).Built-in Speakers & Microphone,   Battery 3.7V (3000 mAh), Micro SD Card Slot (Supports up to 32GB) - Includes AC Adaptor, USB Cable & OTG (Micro USB Adapter)
ProductInfo.Name: Lutema MobileOne 7" Android Tablet PC - Blue
